text: Tomara lokara ki ha’la, yitora (jantura) oparata allahara nama loraa haiche tomaloke tara paraa nokhoraa kiya? Tomalokara babe te'om yito haraama karaiche seya te'om tomalokara ocarata bisadabharae'i barnana karaiche, kintu tomaloke niraupaya ha’le seya sbatantra katha. Niscaya bahute ajnatabasata nijara prabrttira dbaraa anaka bipathagami karae; niscaya tomara pratipalake simalanghanakarai sakalara bisaye adhika jane
